meta.title: Nixify - Windows/macOS/Linux ‚Üí NixOS Migration
meta.description: Migrate from Windows/macOS/Linux to NixOS by extracting system information and generating NixOS configurations

declarative.title: ‚ú® Declarative System Configuration
declarative.text: Your entire system is described in a single configuration file. No more manual changes that are forgotten later.

immutable.title: üîí Immutable & Reproducible
immutable.text: Every system generation is immutable and can be restored at any time. Identical systems on different machines.

atomic.title: üîÑ Atomic Updates & Rollbacks
atomic.text: System updates are atomic - either everything works or nothing changes. One-click rollback to any previous generation.

architecture.title: üèóÔ∏è Architecture
architecture.intro: NixOS Control Center is built on a declarative, modular architecture using Nix Flakes and Home Manager.

declarative.title: ‚ú® Declarative Configuration
declarative.text: Your entire system is described in code. Every package, service, and setting is defined in Nix files. Changes require rebuilding, but this ensures reproducibility and rollback capabilities.

components.title: Key Components
components.flake: Main entry point using Nix Flakes for reproducible builds
components.modular: Configuration split into reusable modules in configs/
components.modules: Automatic module discovery and registration system

rebuild.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Rebuild Required
rebuild.text: Unlike traditional systems, changes in NixOS require a rebuild. This might feel different at first, but it ensures your system is always in a known, reproducible state.
rebuild.note: Every change is atomic - either everything works or nothing changes. This prevents partial updates and broken states.

process.title: Typical Workflow
process.step4: If something breaks, rollback with 'nixos-rebuild switch --rollback'

roadmap.intro: NixOS Control Center is actively developed. Here's what's planned:

reproducible.title: Reproducible
reproducible.text: Identical systems on different machines. Share your config, get the same result.

rollback.title: One-Click Rollback
rollback.text: Every system generation is preserved. Rollback to any previous state instantly.

modular.title: Modular
modular.text: Reusable modules for common configurations. Enable/disable features easily.

future.title: Future-Proof
future.text: With AI integration and skill system planned, the system will become even more powerful.
